div.div: terminate/2 also be called with Reason 'shutdown' when its supervisor dies, if and only if the gen_server called process_flag(trap_exit, true).

switch.text: terminate/2 also be called with Reason 'shutdown' when its supervisor dies, if and only if the gen_server called process_flag(trap_exit, true).

div.div:
The most commonly used Reason:
'normal'
'shutdown'
{'shutdown', Term}
Any other Reason is assumed as an error and is reported with error_logger:format/2
